Name: Old Brooch
LongDescription: Boosts the greater PP consumption forced on enemies by the Pokémon's Pressure ability. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Aerodactyl.  Finding an Old Brooch at the Croagunk Swap Shop is very lucky! Make sure you get it before someone else does! An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
